statements: UPDATE waste_management SET landfill_capacity = 5000, waste_disposal_trend = 'Decreasing' WHERE organization_id = 1;

UPDATE landfill_capacity
SET capacity_in_tons = 500
WHERE landfill_id = 1

location = 'New Location'
WHERE site_id = 3
